name: PangolinEndlessRunner
description:
Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys -> Walking

LeftShift -> Sprint 

Space -> Jump -> DoubleJump -> TripleJump

F-> Collect Ants 

Esc -> Menu


As a Pangolin you're trying to escape the wrath of mighty sky poachers in the eternal floating islands of RimaRock. Try to collect as many Giant Pangolin Ants as you can before "accidentally" falling off.
